p.e:
SOME OF THE WORST WEAPONS ARE BORN OUT OF PEACEFUL INTENTIONS.

THIS IS A VIVE REMOTE. THROUGH VARIOUS
SCRIPT TESTS, TWO SCIENTISTS, MCCHEESE 
AND A MYSTERIOUS "DR. EMILY" TURNED THIS 
REMOTE INTO A PROTOTYPE FOR THE WORLD'S
MOST DANGEROUS WEAPON. ALTHOUGH NOT
AS DESTRUCTIVE AS THE ATOM BOMB V2, THIS
WEAPON IS CAPABLE OF DESTROYING WORLDS
AND SHOULD NOT BE USED.
